30#if defined(HAVE_CONFIG_H)
31#include "bconfig.h"
32#endif
33
34#include <err.h>
35#include <stdarg.h>
36#include <stdio.h>
37#include <stdlib.h>
38
39#include <atf-c/defs.h>
40#include "sanity.h"
41
42ATF_DEFS_ATTRIBUTE_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2)
43static
44void
45fail(const char *fmt, ...)
46{
47 va_list ap;
48 char buf[4096];
49
50 va_start(ap, fmt);
51 vsnprintf(buf, sizeof(buf), fmt, ap);
52 va_end(ap);
53 warnx("%s", buf);
54 warnx("%s", "");
55 warnx("This is probably a bug in this application or one of the "
56 "libraries it uses. If you believe this problem is caused "
57 "by, or is related to " PACKAGE_STRING ", please report it "
58 "to " PACKAGE_BUGREPORT " and provide as many detatils as "
59 "possible describing how you got to this condition.");
60
61 abort();
62}
63
64void
65atf_sanity_inv(const char *file, int line, const char *cond)
66{
67 fail("Invariant check failed at %s:%d: %s", file, line, cond);
68}
69
70void
71atf_sanity_pre(const char *file, int line, const char *cond)
72{
73 fail("Precondition check failed at %s:%d: %s", file, line, cond);
74}
75
76void
77atf_sanity_post(const char *file, int line, const char *cond)
78{
79 fail("Postcondition check failed at %s:%d: %s", file, line, cond);
80}
81
